action.primary: Breaks up Blood Stasis, opens the channels and purges hardness

indications: Abdominal masses and amenorrhea from Blood Stasis

contraindications: Contraindicated for those who generate large sores.
Contraindicated for those with Stomach Deficiency.
Contraindicated for women with amenorrhea due to Blood Deficiency.
Do not use without Blood Stasis.

useCases: Amenorrhea with emaciation, abdominal fullness and tidal fever.

notes: One source says that it treats severe injuries, reconnects sinews and bones, kills the three parasites and expels roundworms. It is rarely used for killing parasites.
Calcined Lacquer Duan Gan Qi is less toxic.
